title_en: MysIDC 11.3: Emission of Pollutants to the Atmosphere by Type and Sources
title_ms: MysIDC 11.3: Pelepasan Bahan Pencemar ke Udara mengikut Jenis dan Sumber
description_en: Emission of pollutants to the atmosphere, broken down by type and sources
description_ms: Pelepasan bahan pencemar ke udara, dengan pecahan mengikut jenis dan sumber

fields.name: date
fields.description_en: [Date] The date in YYYY-MM-DD format, with MM-DD set to 01-01 since the data is at annual frequency
fields.description_ms: [Tarikh] Tarikh dalam format YYYY-MM-DD, dengan MM-DD ditetapkan sebagai 01-01 kerana data berfrekuensi tahunan

fields.name: type
fields.description_en: [Categorical] The general category of emission source, such as stationary sources ('Stationary sources'), motor vehicles ('Motor vehicles'), or others ('Others')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Kategori umum sumber pelepasan, seperti sumber pegun ('Stationary sources'), kenderaan bermotor ('Motor vehicles'), atau lain-lain ('Others').

fields.name: source
fields.description_en: [Categorical] The specific source within each general category, such as industrial ('Industrial') or power plant ('Power plant')
fields.description_ms: [Kategori] Sumber spesifik dalam setiap kategori umum, seperti perindustrian ('Industrial') atau loji janakuasa ('Power plant')

fields.name: total_thousand_tonnes
fields.description_en: [Float] The total amount of pollutants emitted, measured in thousand tonnes
fields.description_ms: [Apung] Jumlah keseluruhan bahan pencemar yang dilepaskan, diukur dalam ribu tan
